entityType.comment: Type of entity current comments belongs to

entityId.comment: Reference ID for entity current comment belongs to

adjustment.comment: Adjustment to allowance in current year

carried_over_allowance.comment: Additional allowance to use based on un-used holidays in previous year

sort_order.comment: Is used to determine sorting order of leave types

activated.comment: This flag means that user account was activated, e.g. login

admin.comment: Indicate if account can edit company wide settings

auto_approve.comment: Indicate if leave request from current employee are auto approved

start_date.comment: Date employee start to work for company

end_date.comment: Date emplyee stop working for company

is_team_view_hidden.comment: Determise if Team View is hidden for non-admin users

company_wide_message.comment: Message shown to all users that belong to current company

mode.comment: Indicate which mode the company account is in.

timezone.comment: Timezone current company is located in

integration_api_token.comment: Indicate which mode the company account is in.

carry_over.comment: Defines how may remaining days from allowance are carried over to the next year.

entityType.comment: Type of the entity which change is tracked. E.g. USER, LEAVE etc

entityId.comment: ID of the entity defined by entityType

attribute.comment: Attribute of the entity which chnage is to be recorded
